game.name: YORG.io 3
game.categories: Single-player, Multi-player, PvP, Online PvP, Steam Achievements, In-App Purchases, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: Defend, Attack, Survive! Build up your base and defeat the zombies with this unique combination of tower defense, base building and supply chain management. Now with multiplayer, mods and loads of new content!
game.shortDescriptionEn: Defend, Attack, Survive! Build up your base and defeat the zombies with this unique combination of tower defense, base building and supply chain management. Now with multiplayer, mods and loads of new content!

reviewHighlights.text: 1 nap alatt a kedvencem lett, benne van a gyár stratégia és a védekező stratégia is. Ajánlom.
